scripts.dts: npm run dts:generate && npm run dts:fix && npm run dts:cleanup
scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run dts && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:generator && npm run build:copy_static
scripts.build:esm: ./node_modules/.bin/parcel build --target release_esm --no-cache && mkdir target/esm && cp ./dist/release_esm/clamsensor.js ./target/esm/clamsensor.mjs && cp ./dist/release_esm/clamsensor.js.map ./target/esm/clamsensor.mjs.map
scripts.build:cjs: ./node_modules/.bin/parcel build --target release_cjs --no-cache && mkdir target/cjs && cp ./dist/release_cjs/clamsensor.js ./target/cjs/clamsensor.cjs && cp ./dist/release_cjs/clamsensor.js.map ./target/cjs/clamsensor.cjs.map
scripts.build:generator:
./node_modules/.bin/parcel build --target generator --no-cache && echo "#!/usr/bin/env node
" > ./target/clamsensor_codegen.cjs && cat ./dist/generator/clamsensor_codegen.js >> ./target/clamsensor_codegen.cjs && cp ./dist/generator/clamsensor_codegen.js.map ./target/clamsensor_codegen.cjs.map
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm run pub:publish
scripts.pub:publish: cd target && npm publish --access public && cd ..
